title: Boston Tea Party
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, British, English, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Bristol-based chain restaurant. Extensive menu, several dishes of which are vegan or could be made vegan. Has all day breakfast, burgers and fries, coffee. On two floors with plenty of seating and a very large a scale model aircraft hanging over the stairs. A melding of the old school health food cafes and modern coffee bars.
